title: Ticket #4318: Nordugrid_gahp crashes on failed CWD command
description: As part of submitting a job to a NorduGrid ARC server, the gahp issues a CWD command to learn the job's id. It's expecting a response like 250 "jobs/#######". But in some cases, it gets 226 Abort finished. When this happens, the gridftp client library returns a NULL pointer for the results buffer, which the nordugrid_gahp unconditionally dereferences.
check_ins: 2014-Apr-17 14:27   Check-in [39970]: Nordugrid_gahp crashes on failed CWD command. #4318 If the server doesn't return a 250 response code to our CWD command, the gridftp library invokes our callback with an unallocated buffer. Test for NULL before dereferencing the pointer. (By Jaime Frey )
